[QUOTE=DarkTortoise23;12180081]I'm pretty sure you could always charge and flurry, even before ww80, what that changed was that pen/psy and exploit became passive, so you can charge/flurry/exploit in the same power action. Same with pen/psy with range options like EE[/QUOTE] You are correct. Charge/Flurry/Blades or Charge/Blades/Exploit is how it used to be. You couldn't do Flurry and Exploit with Charge before, you had to choose one.
January 28, 2022
DarkTortoise23
I'm pretty sure you could always charge and flurry, even before ww80, what that changed was that pen/psy and exploit became passive, so you can charge/flurry/exploit in the same power action. Same with pen/psy with range options like EE

Wait...penetrating and EE can combine? I thought they did away with that rule?
January 18, 2022
Goop
I really like this Thor. You get a strong pen attack and if you hit you can follow up with a penetrating EE. Add to that his awesome range and improved multitargeting he can really do a lot of damage. He is a bit top heavy and his later clicks aren't great for his cost but overall he's pretty good.
January 17, 2022
DarkTortoise23
This Thor is [B]pricy[/B](5 points more than the last uncommon thor w/o the time gem), but what you get in exchange is pretty crazy. Thor constantly has p/p blast with 8 range, 2 targets, and character targeting to snipe back row people. And once he hits, he just gets a free attack, that just has to have the target of the first attack as one of your 2 targets? I like it, not gonna lie.
